edu.uci.ics.crawler4j.crawler.authentication

Class AuthInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uci.ics.crawler4j.crawler.authentication.AuthInfo
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicAuthInfo, FormAuthInfo, NtAuthInfo

    public abstract class AuthInfo
extends Object
    Created by Avi Hayun on 11/23/2014. Abstract class containing authentication information needed to login into a user/password protected site
    This class should be extended by specific authentication types like form authentication and basic authentication etc

    This class contains all of the mutual authentication data for all authentication types

    • Constructor Detail

      • AuthInfo

        public AuthInfo()
        Constructs a new AuthInfo.

      • AuthInfo

        protected AuthInfo(AuthInfo.AuthenticationType authenticationType,
        FormSubmitEvent.MethodType httpMethod,
        String loginUrl,
        String username,
        String password)
            throws MalformedURLException
        This constructor should only be used by extending classes
        Parameters:
        authenticationType - Pick the one which matches your authentication
        httpMethod - Choose POST / GET
        loginUrl - Full URL of the login page
        username - Username for Authentication
        password - Password for Authentication
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - Make sure your URL is valid
